author: Scott McDonald
title: Former MLB All-Star Jim Edmonds Hospitalized For Coronavirus Testing, Sends Message While Awaiting Results
description: "Held off as long as I could," Jim Edmonds wrote of waiting to go take a test for the coronavirus. "I thought I was tough enough to get through. This virus is no joke."
content:
Jim Edmonds, a four-time Major League Baseball all-star and 2006 World Series champion, has been hospitalized to undergo COVID-19 testing after battling symptoms that had him feeling "super sick."
Edmonds posted an Instagram story with a photo of himself in … [+2214 chars]
